tools.author: maudgrn
tools.name: type tool
tools.description: Type Tool is a p5.js environment for interactive typography that renders text inside a responsive, corner-rounding bounding box. It uses interpolation to scale individual characters based on cursor proximity or automated sine-wave pulses. The interface allows for real-time adjustments to typographic weight, spacing, and colors through a modular palette system with individual channel locks. This tool balances expressive motion design with precise layout control, supporting high-resolution PNG and GIF exports.
